title: Hired Gun Graves (gap between cylinder and barrel)

embed.description: League of Legends Hired Graves Skin Spotlight. Purchase RP here and help support this channel via the amazon affiliate program (NA): http://amzn.to/2leXAxO Shows off Animations and Ability Effects of Graves on their Hired Skin in this Spotlight. All footage was taken in game.

body: {{champion:104}}  Don't know if this has been bug fixed yet, since I haven't seen this skin in ages, but if it hasn't there's a visible gap between the cylinder and the barrel of the gun that looks really weird and ugly. Then again it's only priced at 520 so that might be a part of the skin. Pls no hate if it has already been fixed, I'm just trying to help out.{{champion:104}}

replies.body:
Hey Mama Spaghetti! 

I'm really sorry for the delay on this. I've had this bug sitting on my to-do list to follow up on. So, this was a lot easier to resolve than we thought! 

Turns out, this guy was just missing the VFX that base had. (Both guns have a gap in them, but with VFX, you don't notice it!) 

Here's what Hired Guns Graves looks like all touched up, along with a comparison of base Graves!

https://imgur.com/lRa0Q37

This should be ready for live in 7.19. Thanks for the report! :)

I'm sorry to reply to you here, but there are a few Rumble bugs new to 7.18 that hits him pretty hard, such as not receiving the Danger Zone bonus damage sometimes while he has the orange bar and he can't fire his E at all while overheated. I'm just concerned that this will be live during worlds since Rumble is a competitive pick...
